description.value: This code system contains codes for documenting the status of a credential, both for identity and qualification.

definition.value: The document stating identity or the qualification can be considered for use.
The document stating identity or the qualification may not be considered valid for use.
The document stating identity or the qualification was issued in error with no further explanation.
The document stating identity or the qualification was revoked by the issuing organization.
The document stating identity or the qualification is in an interim status with no further explanation. It may, or may not be considered valid for use.
